# 知乎问答：亲手把一家公司弄垮是怎样的感觉？

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/zhihu-wenda-qinshou-ba-yijia-gongsi-nongkua-shi-zenyang-de-ganjue
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/zhihu-wenda-qinshou-ba-yijia-gongsi-nongkua-shi-zenyang-de-ganjue
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install zhihu-wenda-qinshou-ba-yijia-gongsi-nongkua-shi-zenyang-de-ganjue
zhihu-wenda-qinshou-ba-yijia-gongsi-nongkua-shi-zenyang-de-ganjue <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g zhihu-wenda-qinshou-ba-yijia-gongsi-nongkua-shi-zenyang-de-ganjue
zhihu-wenda-qinshou-ba-yijia-gongsi-nongkua-shi-zenyang-de-ganjue <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
